item.description:
DONATION DOUBLED - SPECIAL EVENT!
On the second Saturday of every month, Loving Hut Chandler (http://lovinghut.us/worcester) holds a $10 all-you-can-eat vegan buffet fundraiser for VegWorcester. 10% is donated to VegWorcester to support local events and outreach! We are currently trying to raise funds to produce more of our Veg Dining Guides to Worcester.

This month of August is special because a new local eco-friendly business, SUSTAINABLE THEORY is DOUBLING THE DONATION! That's right, Sustainable Theory will match the 10% proceeds donation, which means we'll get an extra 10% for each person who comes to the buffet!

( Sustainable Theory is committed to a lifestyle driven by environmentally friendly, sustainable ideas, and will be developing green cleaning services and a natural, environmentally-friendly hair salon with select spa services in Worcester, MA-

Expected to open this fall - http://www.facebook.com/sustainabletheory

INVITE YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS to the August 2012 Loving Hut Vegan buffet to try some delicious cruelty-free cuisine and to support our fundraising efforts to print more Veg Dining Guides!

 

  • This is an (informal meetup) meaning that we won't necessarily be meeting up and all sitting together in formal meetup fashion, but you are invited to attend with friends and family between 12-5pm.

 

FACEBOOK EVENT INVITE: http://www.facebook.com/events/142455802559591/

 

For more info:
info@vegworcester.com
http://lovinghut.us/worcester

http://www.vegworcester.com
http://www.facebook.com/vegworcester
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street and come on in!
item.name: Loving Hut's August Vegan Buffet Fundraiser
